DOC.brief_title: A Comparison EpiCept™ NP-1 Topical Cream v . Oral Gabapentin Postherpetic Neuralgia ( PHN )
DOC.detailed_description: This phase II , multicenter , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , parallel group study NP-1 oral gabapentin approximately 500 patient PHN . Adult patient pain result PHN meeting eligibility requirement screen 7 day determine average daily pain intensity . Qualifying patient randomize 2:2:1 basis NP-1 , oral gabapentin , placebo . The treatment period 4-Weeks .
